title: please Riot
body:
Dear Riot Games,

Recently i recieved a perma ban and i understand why i got it. Yes like a normal human i get shiz games which frustrates me causing me to do all kinds of things. But Riot as you might already know i have spent a heck a lot of money on that account and i really do not want to lose the money so instead of a perma ban can you give me something like a perma speech restriction or anything else but a perma ban? Pretty please Riot i promise i won't be a dickhead anymore and if i am to do it again then you can perma ban me and no one can deny it. But just this one please Riot Games I have spent a lot of money for skins and that and i really don't want to lose it. Or can you transfer the skins and champs if i were to make another account? And same thing for the new account i might make, if i do ANYTHING which harasses anyone you can then BAM perma ban me forever but Riot just this once i beg you i really do not want the money to go to a waste.

Thank you,

replies.body: If they made an exception for you, they would have to make it for everyone.
lol rip its gone for good

You broke the rules, these are the consequences.

Deal with it.
